items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic sweater dress!
items.body: This dress has the most amazing fabric and fits beautifully! Buttery soft snd warm! Read more
items.author: Carol N

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Very nice and well made dress but Not above the knee. In fact its about 3" below the knee. Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater dress
items.body: I love this sweater dress it’s so comfortable and I love the stretch to it. The dress is thick I love the colors it’s rich and nicely made. being pregnant comfort is everything and this something you would want in your closet especially during the winter. Read more
items.author: Bless

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, not for my body type
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This will look really good...on somebody else. It's not designed for curvier ladies. It's not designed for shorter ladies. It is well made. It is soft and warm. I will possibly wear it with the skirt section turned up inside the sweater. As a dress, it is a definitely no for anyone with hips. I like the color blocking. I feel like the proportions are off in the shoulders, but they had to make it largest for the bust. Tall and thin women will be thrilled with this. It won't make it into my regular winter rotation, but if I have a wardrobe malfunction, it will be a decent backup. Read more
items.author: DJ McDonald

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Sweater Dress
items.body: I was not sure how I felt about the pattern on this dress when I ordered it, but it is so cute in person. This dress is of a higher quality material. It has a buttery soft and silky feel to it. It is more form fitting, yet still stretchy and forgiving. I don't feel self conscious in this dress at all. The pattern helps hide any problem areas. I ordered a medium and it was true to size. The length was great as I am 5'8 and have a hard time finding dresses that are long enough. This fell at knee length for me. This would be really cute worn with knee high boots on a cool Fall day. Overall, this is a well made sweater dress for the price. Read more
items.author: Larry benson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a good find
items.body: I havent washed it yet but the feel of it seems like a more expensive garment than it actually is. It is quite an attractivegarment its just fitted enough to be flattering to your natural curves but not so fitting that its not forgiving where I prefer it to be. I cant wait to wear it with my fall tights and knee high boots Read more
items.author: Mrs. Garcia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can wear as a shirt or dress
items.body: Can scrunch up to make it look like a cute shirt with pants or wear as a dress. Soft and stretchy and great quality. It's thick and warm and fits great Read more
items.author: Charlene Reveles

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress and Perfect Gift!
items.body: I got this sweater dress for my mom as a birthday present, and she absolutely loved it! The material is soft, warm and comfortable while still looking elegant and stylish. The plaid print is very flattering and the fit hugs in all the right places without being too tight. It’s a great piece that can be dressed up for parties or worn more casually in the winter. She received so many compliments wearing it. Definitely a wonderful find and a perfect gift! Read more
items.author: COCO CHANEL

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
